item.title: Forcing women to carry unwanted pregnancies is wrong. Ejaculators should not be making the rules around what happens with pregnancies.

item.title: Abortion access saves lives. I very nearly lost my life due to a ruptured ectopic pregnancy. Pregnancy is precarious.
